00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_ABSTRACT_REGISTRATION_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_ABSTRACT_REGISTRATION_H_
00032 #include <string>
00033 
00034 #include "lubyk/mutex.h"
00035 #include "mdns/location.h"
00036 
00037 using namespace lubyk;
00038 
00039 namespace mdns {
00040 
00044 class AbstractRegistration : public Mutex {
00045  public:
00046   AbstractRegistration(const char *service_type, const char *name, uint port, const char *txt);
00047 
00048   virtual ~AbstractRegistration();
00049 
00050   const char *name() {
00051     return name_.c_str();
00052   }
00053 
00054  protected:
00055   bool getService();
00056 
00057   std::string name_;
00058   std::string host_;
00059   std::string service_type_;
00060   uint16_t    port_;
00061   std::string txt_;
00062   int fd_;
00063 
00064  private:
00065   class Implementation;
00066   Implementation *impl_;
00067 };
00068 
00069 } // mdns
